TopicTitle: Framerate locked at 32 FPS during launch of anykind.

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I have been playing KSP for about 4 months now and all of a sudden I've been running into some performance issues. I get 144FPS while playing KSP but when I load any craft out into the world, my FPS drops and locks at 32FPS. Please, help me.

Mods:

- B9 Part Switch

- Click Through Blocker

- Filter Extensions - Plugin

- Insight

- Kerbal Reusability Expansion

- Kerbalized SpaceX

- Module Manager

- Near Future Solar

- Near Future Solar Core

- Near Future Spacecraft

- RasterPropMonitor

-RasterPropMonitor Core

- TextureReplacer

-Toolbar Controller

-Trajectories

 

 

Thanks,

Rice
